trans-unit.source: Each time you use Prayer of Healing on a hero, that hero adds 1 additional brown die to his defense pool until the start of your next turn. Place a hero token belonging to that hero on this card as a reminder.
∞: Perform an attack with a Melee weapon. If you deal at least 1 ≥ (after rolling defense dice), you and 1 hero of your choice adjacent to you each recover 2 ≥.
Each time you use Prayer of Healing on a hero, that hero may also discard 1 of his Condition cards.

Each time you use Prayer of Healing on a hero, that hero adds 1 additional yellow power die to his attack pool on his next attack this round. Place a hero token belonging to that hero on this card as a reminder.
Your Prayer of Healing may now affect 2 different heroes. If you roll a ± on the red power die when using Prayer of Healing, both heroes recover 1 ∏.
Exhaust this card during your turn and choose yourself or an adjacent hero. Roll 1 red power die. The chosen hero recovers ≥ equal to the ≥ rolled.
∞: Exhaust this card. While this card is exhausted, monsters cannot perform an attack while adjacent to you.
∞: Roll 1 red power die. Each hero in your line of sight (including yourself) recovers the amount of ≥ rolled. Each monster in your line of sight suffers the amount of ≥ rolled.
∞: You receive 2 movement points and recover 2 ≥.
After defeating a monster with an attack using a Melee weapon, exhaust this card to move up to you Speed and perform an additional attack.

Exhaust this card to choose a monster in you line of sight and place your hero token on it. While this card is exhausted, each attack performed by you or the monster, when targeting each other, gains +1 ≥.
When a hero adjacent to you is targeted by an attack, use this card to instead declare yourself as the target of the attack. Range and line of sight are still measured to the targeted hero's space.

As long as you have a Shield equipped, add 1 additional brown die to your defense pool (even if this card is exhausted). When you would exhaust your equipped Shield (such as to use the Shield's ability), you may exhaust this card instead.

When a monster moves into an empty space adjacent to you, exhaust this card to interrupt that monster’s activation and perform an attack with a Melee weapon. After this attack is resolved, if the monster was not defeated, it may continue its activation.

∞: Choose another hero within 3 spaces of you who has a monster adjacent to him. Place your hero figure in the closest empty space adjacent to the monster and perform an attack with a Melee weapon against that monster.
While you have a Shield equipped (even if exhausted), each of your attacks with a Melee weapon gain: ±: Choose a monster adjacent to you. That monster is Stunned.
You gain +2 Health. When you are defeated, you may immediatly move up to your Speed and perform an attack with a Melee weapon. After the attack is resolved, you are knocked out.
Your Speed is reduced to 4 and cannot be increased above 4.
Exhaust this card after the dice are rolled to cancel 1 ± on an attack that targets you.
Exhaust this card after rolling defense dice to either reroll one die or add 1 Shield to the results.
Once per attack roll, you may reroll 1 red power die.
Adjacent figures do not block your line of sight.
±: Deal 1 ≥ to another monster within 3 spaces of the target
Limit 1 Helmet equipped at a time.
Exhaust this card to reroll an attribute test. You must keep the new results.
After rolling attack dice, exhaust this card to add 1 ± to the results.
When you perform 2 move actions on your turn, suffer 1 ∏ at the end of your turn.
If your other hand is empty, your attacks gain +1 ≥.
Exhaust this card after rolling defense dice to replace the results with a number of ≤ equal to your µ
Exhaust this card after rolling defense dice to reroll 1 defence die and add 1 ≤ to the results.
If you roll one or more blanks when rolling defence dice, add 1 ≤ to your results.
±: Each monster adjacent to you suffers 1 ≥
Your Speed is reduced to 3 and cannot be increased above 3.
Once per attack, you may reroll 1 power die.
∞: Exhaust this card to roll 1 red power die. You recover ≥ equal to the ≥ rolled.
